abstract: Facebook has sued a rival in Germany for copyright infringement, just a few months after launching its own service in that country. The suit called StudiVZ a “knock-off” of Facebook’s popular social networking Web site.
lead_paragraph: Facebook has sued a rival in Germany for copyright infringement, just a few months after launching its own service in that country. The suit called StudiVZ a “knock-off” of Facebook’s popular social networking Web site.

headline.main: Facebook to German Rival: Sprechen Sie Lawsuit?
